channel.title: Limiting death to pk points
channel.description: so i want to make it where if a player dies by the same person twice the person who kills him wont get any pk points. So i can stop pk point farming.

item.title: Limiting death to pk points
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:3, topic:426210”]Use an array list to store names of last killed players.

If you kill someone again without waiting a day period, or killing three other DIFFERENT members you cannot gain a ‘pkpoint’ from the same person.

After you have waited ‘X’ amount of time or, killed ‘X’ amount of different people remove the name from the array list.[/quote]

This will work as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Limiting death to pk points
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Use an array list to store names of last killed players.

If you kill someone again without waiting a day period, or killing three other DIFFERENT members you cannot gain a ‘pkpoint’ from the same person.

After you have waited ‘X’ amount of time or, killed ‘X’ amount of different people remove the name from the array list.

Read full topic

item.title: Limiting death to pk points
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

The first idea that comes to mind? You can add an ID to your “Killer” method. Then you can use a Ternary operator in a method to determine if It’s the same person. You might want to check your “GetLastKiller, Killer, GetKiller, or something similar” method, it might already determine who the Killer was.

Read full topic
